content:
/>
XIV.4.B.1.i
.
Prohibition of Releasing FTI by Fax
Faxing FTI is strictly prohibited.  If FTI is faxed, it may be an improper disclosure of FTI.  Refer to
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B.1.m
for reporting procedures.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
